reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful with pretty patterns and appreciate its perfect fit, particularly noting it works well for curvy women. They describe it as well-made, comfortable, and flattering, with one customer mentioning it helps cinch at the waist to show curves. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it runs too long. The fabric quality also gets mixed reviews, with some

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breastfeeding friendly
items.body: I first found a dress at the second hand store, and it was a PrettyGarden brand. I liked it so much I googled them and behold Amazon had it. I happened to get one when it went on sale and I am happy with this one, too. The color is vibrant and beautiful. The material isn't the same as the one I thrifted, but it is still nice and okay though I like the older dress material better. It has a built in slip and it seems true to size. I am normally a M (5'3, 140 lbs) but I wear a L in my chest and I am also a breastfeeding momma! That is why I liked this so much. It is SO easy to breastfeed in. You don't have to buy an overly priced, and also unflattering and ugly nursing dress. Being a V neck and able to unsnap and just pop a feed sack out for your little makes life easy happy. Baby can stay full and happy while mom looks pretty ðŸ˜Š This is church appropriate. It is very light so good for summer. I ordered a L for my chest (32DD) I wasn't worried about my waist since it has a belt to cinch. Read more
items.author: Arneth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars **Perfect Dress for a Last-Minute Wedding in Vegas!**
items.body: I'm a fan of most things from PRETTY GARDEN, and this Flowy Maxi Dress did not disappoint! I needed a dress for a friend's wedding in Las Vegas and, having waited until the last minute, I ended up buying three dresses on Amazon. This one was the best and also the most affordable. I've been more self-conscious lately due to some weight gain, so finding something flattering was crucial. This dress exceeded my expectations, making me feel great despite my added flaws. It's incredibly comfortable and lightweight, which was perfect for the hot Las Vegas weather. Despite its length and long sleeves, it was surprisingly cool and comfortable. Additionally, it doesn't wrinkle easily, so it went from the suitcase to a minor touch-up with the iron and then straight to the wedding party without any hassle. The cherry on top was that it matched my boyfriend's suit perfectly! If you're looking for a stylish, comfortable, and affordable dress, I highly recommend this one. It was an absolute lifesaver! Read more
items.author: Boundbywildthings

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sundress, great quality for price
items.body: It fits true to size on length, waist and arms but is a little big in the bust area but I am only a B/C cup. I was still able to tie down where itâ€™s larger with the waist tie so the dress still fits without hanging out. The material is very light with a cream liner that covers and hides your underwear. Itâ€™s a great dress to wear in the summer or in the spring when itâ€™s still cool. I just added a jean jacket when it was cooler out in the morning and warmed up during the afternoon. Read more
items.author: Alexandra

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wasnâ€™t right for me!
items.body: Pros: beautiful blue color! Absolutely beautiful! The fabric is thick enough that it is not see through but is still light enough that itâ€™s comfortable. I would say itâ€™s perfect for spring, fall and maybe summer weather. The length of the sleeves hit just right, as did the length of the dress. Cons: the chest area just hit very strangely on me. I am currently breastfeeding and liked this dress as an option because it had the snap in the middle for easy feeding. The snap didnâ€™t seem to be aligned well though and just gave a very strange look. Iâ€™ve been trying to twist the dress thinking that could be the reason but unfortunately, it just returns to this position. For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€ and about 180. Read more
items.author: ASReader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Garden Dress
items.body: This dress is beautiful. Will wear it for church and for special occasions. The bodice has a snap, two more snaps were provided to secure more of the V neckline; which is good because it is too low for me. The fabric is delicate though not see through; it is lined on the bodice and has a knee length lining, as well. The long sleeves are not lined; there is a fabric belt made of the same fabric. The print is lovely. This dress has a nice fuller skirt, which will fit curvy women. The print is lovely and feminine. The workmanship is excellent. I am rather particular about quality, this dress did not disappoint. The dress I chose has a dominant purple color. It also comes in a different shade, the dominant color is a red-orange color; also an attractive color. Though I did not know it, I saw a picture of one of my cousins wearing the dress she purchased in the second red-orange color. Also, I happened to buy this dress when it was on sale. Read more
items.author: Jude Hodges

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty
items.body: I wore this to a casual summer wedding and it was very beautiful. Nice and lightweight for a hot, outdoor wedding, and you're able to dress it up for down. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits right for me
items.body: I have this dress for a while and the color didnâ€™t fade. It feels the same quality as when I bought it first. I wear it a lot and will be good for pregnancy as well. I am usually a small and I chose small even if it still has some room in it. I have it in multiple colors. Read more
items.author: Alle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress to wear to a wedding
items.body: Very nice dress for a wedding. Dresses run small. I had to send one back and get a larger size. Read more
items.author: Toni M.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Blue, Floral Purple, Black, Solid Wine Red, Floral Wine Red, Solid Dark Bule, Solid Light Blue, B_red, Solid Black, B_green, Solid Blue, Solid Rose Pink, Floral Navy, Floral Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
